about_the_game:
Reminiscent of Jump king and Celeste. Henry SquareMan has fallen off a cliff and into the Caverns for absolutely no reason. Help him get out Squared through various means of movement-based skills that you can learn/master throughout his journey. Beware, it is not as easy as it seems. You may end up falling back to where you started if you slip up.
  • Learn how to hold onto walls then use your jump to scale up.
  • Avoid the Spikes and Slopes that will hinder your progress and completely crush your spirit.
  • Attain the very fire within you, in the form of Willpower, to help you keep your sanity through Quick Time Events to save yourself from starting all over again at the bottom.
  • Meet the Eagle Spirit who will either guide you or mock you with your progress.
  • Meet a Rat who has had interesting experiences in his life.
  • Listen to the very obnoxious sound of Henry hitting the spikes and slopes. You might like it, who knows. HMM..

Once you've escaped via the bridge.. perhaps, if you still have the fire in you, then maybe, you can Kneel before the Eagle Statue and escape Squared how it was meant to be escaped.
detailed_description:
Reminiscent of Jump king and Celeste. Henry SquareMan has fallen off a cliff and into the Caverns for absolutely no reason. Help him get out Squared through various means of movement-based skills that you can learn/master throughout his journey. Beware, it is not as easy as it seems. You may end up falling back to where you started if you slip up.
  • Learn how to hold onto walls then use your jump to scale up.
  • Avoid the Spikes and Slopes that will hinder your progress and completely crush your spirit.
  • Attain the very fire within you, in the form of Willpower, to help you keep your sanity through Quick Time Events to save yourself from starting all over again at the bottom.
  • Meet the Eagle Spirit who will either guide you or mock you with your progress.
  • Meet a Rat who has had interesting experiences in his life.
  • Listen to the very obnoxious sound of Henry hitting the spikes and slopes. You might like it, who knows. HMM..

Once you've escaped via the bridge.. perhaps, if you still have the fire in you, then maybe, you can Kneel before the Eagle Statue and escape Squared how it was meant to be escaped.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

name: SquareMan

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+) and Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD A10-5700 / Intel Core i3-3220
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R7-240 / GForce 650Ti / Intel 630
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Reminiscent of Jump King and Celeste. Henry (SquareMan) has fallen off a Cliff and into a the Caverns of Squared. Attain Willpower and escape via the bridge atop the mountain in this very punishing 2D Precision Platformer. Beware the Spikes and Slopes.
